about_the_game:
You can listen to the background music from the main episode of The Cloud Dream of the Nine and the theme song containing the individuality of each character.
In addition, in line with the addition of Hongyeom's scenario, a new theme song of Hongyeom has been added!
Enjoy this exciting and romantic story through the vivid and rich melodies used as backgrounds of the main story and special theme songs of the characters.

[Guide]

This is a DLC that can be purchased while possessing the main game.
The OST can be played in the game.

One girl's love story OST Vol. 1

37. Farewell

One girl's love story OST Vol. 2

01. Love Song of Gentle Breeze - Chaeyoon(CV : Choi Jihun)
02. Wish if you could stand under the moon - Wol(CV : Lee Hosan)
03. Love Proposal - Kyungwon(CV : Um sanghyun)
04. When flowers bloom - Chungwoon(CV : Kim Sangbaek)
05. By the window under the willow tree - Baeknan(CV : Shim Gyuhyuk)
06. Back in time - Simyeon(CV : Jang Minhyuk)
07. Always - Haerang(CV : Shin Yongwoo)
08. Endless Game - Hongyeom(CV : Wie Hun)
09. The way you go - Hongyeom(CV : Wie Hun)

You can listen to the background music from the main episode of The Cloud Dream of the Nine and the theme song containing the individuality of each character.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

short_description: You can listen to the background music from the main episode of The Cloud Dream of the Nine and the theme song containing the individuality of each character. This is a DLC that can be purchased while possessing the main game. The OST can be played in the game.
supported_languages:
Korean*, English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
